hangle: 거기에 있는거 다 알고 있다, 시그렌.
이럴 때만 보호자 노릇을 똑똑히 한다니까!
first_translate: this is why I don’t like having him around when we have our dates...!
it’ll just have to wait until next time.
let me try this thing called romance too.
let me try this thing called romance too.
the door will break if you keep pulling on it!!!
is this really where his highness lives?
lord cain ereze, eldest son of marquis ereze.
your wounds are almost healed, aren’t they? you can return soon.
when you do, go back to the second prince’s palace and watch over him closely.
but my lordship, I serve at her highness’ palace.
while you were away recovering from your injuries, I changed your post for you.

hangle: 잘 감시해서, 이상한 건 바로 보고하거라.
first_translate: make sure to report anything unusual immediately.

hangle: 이건 가문을 위해 아주 중요한 일이다.
first_translate: doing this well is very important for our family.
I’d rather not get involved in such things though...

hangle: 이 지긋지긋한 정쟁은 아버지 대에서 끝내야 돼.
first_translate: all these political schemes must end during my generation.
now look what I’ve gotten myself into...
so you did come back after all...
training has been too hard lately...

hangle: 기사가 훈련이 힘들다고 하면 어떻게 해?
first_translate: and how would you feel about hearing that coming from one of your knights?

hangle: 네가 아직 이곳을 못 겪어 봐서 그래!!
first_translate: you wouldn’t understand because you haven’t experienced life here yet!!

hangle: 케인 에레즈, 시그렌 황자 전하를 처음으로 뵙습니다.
first_translate: I am cain ereze. it’s nice to meet you, your highness.

hangle: 오늘부터 황자 전하의 궁을 지키는 임무를 수행하게 됐습니다.
first_translate: starting today, I shall carry out my duties by serving under your highness.
even though I may lack many qualities, I promise to give my best efforts.
look at this guy trembling before me...

hangle: 진짜로 정식 예법대로 인사하는 놈은 처음 보네.
first_translate: I’ve never seen anyone greet someone according to formal etiquette before.
not only was I the sole heir to the throne,

hangle: 내 심기를 거스르려는 사람은 하나도 없었단 말이다.
first_translate: nobody dared cross paths with me either.
from this day forward, I declare sieglinus as the official second prince of the empire!

hangle: 이 자리에서 시그렌을 정식 황자로 책봉하겠다!
first_translate: from this day forward, I declare sieglinus as the official second prince of the empire!

hangle: 사생아 새끼가 그딴 식으로 등장하는 바람에!
first_translate: then that illegitimate child came along and ruined everything!

hangle: 최소한 쥐 죽은 듯 있었다면 참아줄 생각이었지만…
first_translate: if he kept himself hidden quietly, I might have let him live...
but no, he had to show off by attending social events...
...and even grabbed me by the collar!

hangle: 고작 여자 한명에 대해 이야기 했다는 이유로!
first_translate: all because I talked about some woman!

hangle: 내가 황제가 되면 맨 먼저 그 자식을 단두대에 올릴 거다.
first_translate: the first thing I’m going to do once I become emperor is put him up against the guillotine.

hangle: 그놈을 어떻게 괴롭게 할 방법이 없을까.
first_translate: there must be something else I could do to torment him.

hangle: 그 자식이 유일하게 감정적인 동요를 나타낸 여자.
first_translate: there’s only one person who makes him lose control emotionally.
if I ever lay hands on her,

hangle: 보아하니 마음에 꽤 두고 있는 것 같은데.
first_translate: judging by their interactions, she seems quite dear to him.
should I mess with them a bit?

hangle: 헤일론 공작이 싸고도는 여자애를 대놓고 어떻게 하기는 힘들지만…
first_translate: of course, since duke halyeon guards her tightly, getting close to her won’t be easy...
but if I can’t do it personally,
can’t I just use others instead?
call my assistant in here right now!
